title: Toyota Kirloskar to step up play in smaller towns
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor, the Indian unit, has been selling Maruti cars under its own badge since 2022 as part of a global alliance between Suzuki Motor Corp and Toyota Motor Corp. The move has helped Toyota save on development costs and expand the model line-up.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
